title: Unable to Connect to server
body:
Hey there!
Earlier today I decided I was going to hop online and play some URF.
Upon trying to queue, I kept receiving the "players are not ready" error.
This was resolved by initiating a full repair from inside the client.
Afterwards I attempted to solo queue again and proceeded to sit in queue for almost 10 minutes without a game popping.
I tried queueing with a friend and entered a lobby as normal, but when the game should have started loading I received the "unable to connect to server, please check your connection and try again" error.
I attempted more repairs but nothing is fixing it.
When attempting to join any game, even a custom, I am now getting the "unable to connect to server, please check your connection and try again" error despite the fact I have no other issues with my internet.
I've tried further repairs, and using a different account to no avail.
I've tried disabling firewalls and my antivirus. 
I've tried changing my DNS settings, and flushing my dns.
The problem seems to have popped up out of nowhere and it didn't exist yesterday.

Does anyone have any ideas that might help? I'd love to be able to play some more URF before it disappears.

Thanks!

replies.body:
Have you updated ur computer these days? Specifically, last night?
If yes, reset your computer to the preview version, and everything will be all right
